Firmware Update Service

NOTICE:

The namespace prefix http://cisco.com/jnap/ has been deprecated but is still supported. All JNAP clients should switch to the new namespace prefix http://linksys.com/jnap/.

Change History

Revision Date Notes
2.0.1 2023-10-18 Added result ErrorUnsupportedUpdatePolicy to action SetFirmwareUpdateSettings, for cases where the update policy is restricted. For example, when EasyLink is enabed on the router, the only policy supported is AutomaticallyCheckAndInstall.
2.0.0 2019-07-17 Added FirmwareUpdate2 service to indicate the following actions now require authentication:
  • GetFirmwareUpdateSettings
  • GetFirmwareUpdateStatus

Services

FirmwareUpdate

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/FirmwareUpdate
This service provides access to firmware update settings on a device.

Service Actions

  • GetFirmwareUpdateSettings
  • GetFirmwareUpdateStatus
  • SetFirmwareUpdateSettings
  • UpdateFirmwareNow

FirmwareUpdate2

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/FirmwareUpdate2
This service provides access to firmware update settings on a device.

Service Actions

  • GetFirmwareUpdateSettings
  • GetFirmwareUpdateStatus
  • SetFirmwareUpdateSettings
  • UpdateFirmwareNow

Actions

GetFirmwareUpdateSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/GetFirmwareUpdateSettings
This action gets the device's firmware update settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
updatePolicy FirmwareUpdatePolicy no Whether the device should automatically check for and install firmware updates.
autoUpdateWindow FirmwareAutoUpdateWindow no The period of time each day when the device will automatically check for and install firmware updates. Note that this value has no effect when the value of the updatePolicy output parameter is Manual.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/GetFirmwareUpdateSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/GetFirmwareUpdateSettings"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "updatePolicy": "AutomaticallyCheckAndInstall",
    "autoUpdateWindow": {
      "startMinute": 1800,
      "durationMinutes": 240
    }
  }
}

GetFirmwareUpdateStatus

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/GetFirmwareUpdateStatus
This action gets information about any available firmware update that the device is aware of, and the status of any pending firmware update operation.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
lastSuccessfulCheckTime DateTime no The last time that the device successfully checked for available firmware updates.
availableUpdate FirmwareUpdate yes Information about an available firmware update. This value will not be present if no update is currently available, or if the firmware update service on the device is not aware that one is available.
pendingOperation FirmwareUpdateOperationStatus yes Information about the firmware update operation, if any, that is currently in progress. This value will not be present if no firmware update operation is in progress.
lastOperationFailure FirmwareUpdateOperationFailure yes The reason why the most recent attempted firmware update operation failed. This value will not be present if the pendingOperation parameter is present, or if the most recent firmware update operation succeeded.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/GetFirmwareUpdateStatusResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/GetFirmwareUpdateStatus"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "lastSuccessfulCheckTime": "2011-11-17T03:30:00Z",
    "availableUpdate": {
      "firmwareVersion": "1.2",
      "firmwareDate": "2010-07-12T00:00:00Z",
      "description": "v1.2 (English)"
    },
    "pendingOperation": {
      "operation": "Checking",
      "progressPercent": 37
    },
    "lastOperationFailure": "CheckFailed"
  }
}

SetFirmwareUpdateSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/SetFirmwareUpdateSettings
This action sets the device's firmware update settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
updatePolicy FirmwareUpdatePolicy no Whether the device should automatically check for and install firmware updates.
autoUpdateWindow FirmwareAutoUpdateWindow no The period of time each day when the device should automatically check for and install firmware updates. Note that this value has no effect when the value of the updatePolicy output parameter is Manual.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/SetFirmwareUpdateSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorInvalidAutoUpdateWindowDurationMinutes The value specified for the autoUpdateWindow parameter's durationMinutes member was not between 0 and 1440.
ErrorInvalidAutoUpdateWindowStartMinute The value specified for the autoUpdateWindow parameter's startMinute member was not between 0 and 1439.
ErrorUnsupportedUpdatePolicy The input updatePolicy is not supported. For example, the EasyLink service is enabled on the router, but the input updatePolicy was not AutomaticallyCheckAndInstall.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/SetFirmwareUpdateSettings"

{
  "updatePolicy": "AutomaticallyCheckAndInstall",
  "autoUpdateWindow": {
    "startMinute": 1800,
    "durationMinutes": 240
  }
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

UpdateFirmwareNow

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/UpdateFirmwareNow
This action checks for an available firmware update and optionally installs it.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
onlyCheck bool no Whether the device should only check for an available firmware update, but not install it.
updateServerURL string yes An alternative server URL to use for the firmware update. This URL is used only for the current firmware update attempt. If this value is not present, the firmware update service uses the default server URL, as defined by the device manufacturer.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/UpdateFirmwareNowResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorInvalidUpdateServerURL The value specified for the updateServerURL did not have protocol HTTP or HTTPS.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/UpdateFirmwareNow"

{
  "onlyCheck": false
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

Structures

FirmwareAutoUpdateWindow

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/FirmwareAutoUpdateWindow
The period of time each day when the device will automatically check for and install firmware updates. The device will choose a random time within the firmware auto-update window to actually perform the action. This helps balance the load on firmware update servers by preventing devices from all performing their auto-update actions at the same time.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
startMinute int no The minute of the day, in the device's local time, when the automatic firmware update window begins. For example, if this value is set to 1800, the device will perform automatic firmware update checks at 3:00 AM. This value must be between 0 (12:00 AM) and 1439 (11:59 PM).
durationMinutes int no The duration, in seconds, of the automatic firmware update window. This value must be between 0 and 1440.

FirmwareUpdate

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/FirmwareUpdate
Information about an available firmware update.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
firmwareVersion string no The firmware version.
firmwareDate DateTime no The date associated with the firmware.
description string yes An optional description of the firmware update.

FirmwareUpdateOperationStatus

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/FirmwareUpdateOperationStatus
Information about a specific device firmware version.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
operation FirmwareUpdateOperation no The firmware update operation being performed.
progressPercent int no The progress of the firmware update operation, as a percentage. This value is always between 0 and 100.

Enumerations

FirmwareUpdateOperation

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/FirmwareUpdateOperation
Firmware update operations.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
Checking The firmware update service is checking for available firmware updates.
Downloading The firmware update service is currently downloading a firmware update.
Installing The firmware update service is currently installing a firmware update.
Rebooting The device is about to reboot after installing a firmware update.

FirmwareUpdateOperationFailure

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/FirmwareUpdateOperationFailure
Possible reasons why a firmware update operation failed.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
CheckFailed The firmware update service encountered an error while attempting to check for a firmware update.
DownloadFailed The firmware update service encountered an error while attempting to download a firmware update.
InstallFailed The firmware update service encountered an error while attempting to install a firmware update.

FirmwareUpdatePolicy

http://linksys.com/jnap/firmwareupdate/FirmwareUpdatePolicy
This service provides access to firmware update settings on a device. Policies for automatically checking for and installing firmware updates.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
Manual The device will not automatically check for or install firmware updates.
AutomaticallyCheck The device will automatically check for firmware updates, but will not automatically install them.
AutomaticallyCheckAndInstall The device will automatically check for and install firmware updates.
